translator
Class XmlToJson

java.lang.Object
  resources.RootClass
      translator.XmlToJson

public class XmlToJson
extends RootClass

Utility in charge of translating VOTable received from TAP node n JSONB files comprehensible by the AJAX client. This utility has no connection with the application resources

Version:
$Id: XmlToJson.java 62 2011-10-04 15:17:34Z laurent.mistahl $
Author:
laurent

applyStyle

public static void applyStyle(String inputFile,
                              String outputFile,
                              String styleSheet)
                       throws Exception
Apply a style sheet to an XML file The translation used the saxon engine in order to work with a generic JSON translator courtesy of http://www.saxonica.com/download/download_page.xml

Parameters:
inputFile - File path to translate
outputFile - Translated file path
styleSheet - Applied style sheet
Throws:
Exception - If something goes wrong
